## BERT-QT model

The BERT-QT model is an architecture that uses BERT as a foundation for a question-answering system. The BERT-QT model is composed of two main parts: the BERT architecture, and the question-answering architecture. The BERT architecture is composed of multiple transformer encoder layers, each performing a self-attention mechanism over the input sequence. The question-answering architecture consists of a softmax function that produces predictions for each sequence token, as well
